பெரும் மதிப்பிற்குரிய நீதி அரசர்கள் ஐயா,

100 ரூபாய் பத்திரத்தில் 7/3/2020 அன்று என்னை கொடூரமாக தாக்கியதை பார்த்த சங்கிலி கறுப்பர்கள் சாட்சி உறுதி பத்திரம் தந்துள்ளனர் அதனை உரிய நேரத்தில் சமர்பிப்பேன் ஐயா,எதிர் நீச்சல் அடி

இன்று ஏற்றுக்கொடி

இது Sp க்கும் அவனின் பொய்கதைகளுக்கு பின்னாலும் முன்னாலும் முட்டுகொடுப்பவர்களுக்கு

100 ரூபாய் சாட்சி உறுதி பத்திரம் சமர்பணம் .

என்னை புண்டாமவன் என்று பேசிய காவலருக்கு
எல என்னையால புண்டாமவனு கேட்ட ,அதற்கு நான் எல புண்டாமவனே, அப்படி பொதுமக்களிடம் பேசக்கூடாது என்று சொல்லி கொடுத்தேன் ஐயா,

எல நீவ செய்ய வேண்டிய வேலைய நான் செய்றம்ல

என் நெஞ்சில மிதிப்பியால

உனக்கு லஞ்சம் தரலனா ஏறி மிதிப்பியால

என் சாதிய கேவலமா பேசிவியால

you Are public servant 🔥என்றும் கூறினேன் ஐயா!

🔥Police காரணுக்கும் எனக்கும் சண்டை🔥

2019 ல் பிறகு கன்னியாகுமரி Police station உள்ளேயே போய் செப்டம்பர் மாதம் Camera முன்னாடி நின்னு நான்தான் மெசியா என் கடவுச்சீட்டுக்கு ஒரு பைசா லஞ்சம் தரமாட்டேன் கெத்தா ,திமிரா சொன்னவன் உங்கள் இந்திய குடிமகன் மெசியா🔥

Honourable Minister Department of Telecommunications, Government of India.
(Grievance-Dear Sir, I would like to draw your urgent attention that Kaladu village which comes under the Bamprada Gramapanchyat of Barkote Block in Deogarh District of Odisha State. It is an undeveloped hill cum inter remote area and has been cut out from other part of mainstream area of this country since long time. The network connectivity and internet penetration for Telecommunication is very poor and even not working properly. The residents of this village, students and other business personalities are unable to access the internet for their banking and other online services. The students are also unable to attend any online activities due to above mentioned problems. The people are unable to call the ambulance, fire services due to the lack of network problem during emergency time. The facilities of digital India has not reached to these area till now. They have been underprivileged and digitally not connected with rest of the country. 
Therefore, I kindly request you to please install a new Reliance Jio-4G/5G cum BSNL-3G/4G/5G Mobile Tower under the scheme of Universal Service Obligation Fund (USOF) at the particular place of Kaladu village which comes under the Bamprada Gramapanchyat of Barkote Block in Deogarh District of Odisha State. So that these underprivileged people will be connected digitally and can take the advantages of digital services.)

remarks_text: Detailed action taken report attached
subject_content_text:
Tourism >> Schemes /Projects/ Proposals / Under Schemes of Ministry of Tourism. >> Swadesh Darshan
-----------------------
To,


Hon'ble  Secretary (Tourism)
Ministry of Tourism
1st Floor Transport Bhawan, 1
Parliament Street, New Delhi.



Sir,


       After meeting reg development of Beri Panchpota Ecotourism in west bengal with Honorable Secretary (Central Tourism Ministry) Mr. Arvind Singh, nearly Eight months passed. There was no initiative to build Ecotourism at Beri Panchpota in west bengal till now. 


       The Beri Panchpota village at Gaighata Block in westbengal is situated 70 km away from Kolkata city in India. Five horse nail shaped lakes (Natural oxbow Lake) flowing in this village. Two biggest lake in this village are Beri lake (8.23 Km long) and Duma lake (14 km long). Others lake are approximately 6 km, 4 km and 3.5 km long. All lakes are naturally developed, and stunningly beautiful sweet rainwater fed water body. All lakes boasts of natural habitats of traditional small fishes, birds, tortoise, flora and fauna. We want to build an eco-tourism in this area. The development of the Beri Panchpota Ecotourism center will benefit millions of people in at least three assembly constituencies in West Bengal. We want, this tourism project should be developed in collaboration with the central and state government both. 



         But, I am sorry to inform you that there was no initiative to build Ecotourism at Beri Panchpota in west bengal till now, even after meeting with Honorable Secretary (Tourism) Mr. Arvind Singh.

இன்று ஏற்றுக்கொடி

Sir , 
        I  married my late husband Sh Mahendra Kumar  Jain (son of  Late Sh Bhura Mal Jain ) who was a permanent resident of 929, Kisan Marg, Barket Nagar , Tonk Phatak , Jaipur   on 16 April 1971, at Jaipur ( Raj ) , and subsequently our  3 sons were born .My husband was working as Police Inspector , (Post & Telecommunication ) , Rajasthan Police .Subsequently , he left police job and started working in the computer science department , University of Rajasthan  and also used to work as homeopathic and biochemic medicine consultant. Around 20 years back ,  he left the Univ job and used to travel and work at various places outside Rajasthan  like Calcutta , Guwahati , Assam etc regarding Homeopathic , biochemic , naturopathy treatment and also work related to computer software  .  He was working for gain at Guwahati and as he had been living here at Guwahati in connection with his service , he had purchased a flat ( in the year 2014 )Flat No.2 D situated in the multistoried building Pink Arcade standing over a plot of land covered by Dag No.55 and 765 of K.P. Patta No.80 and 456 of revenue village- Sahar Sarania Part-I, Mouza- Ulubari, situated at K.C. Sen Road, Paltan Bazar, Guwahati   out of his family fund .    My husband Sh Mahendra Kumar Jain expired  at Jaipur, Rajasthan  on 15th March 2020 . Mahendra Jain , along with my 3 sons , are the legal heirs of my husband. 
After my husband expired , I applied for mutation of the land in his name vide Mission Basundhara Application id  XBXMXTX/X0X1X4X5X, and   XBXMXTX/X0X1X3X7X0X . However , both my applications have been rejected by the circle officer Guwahati Revenue circle without assigning any reason . Subsequently I filed an appeal against it with the Deputy Commissioner Kamrup (M ). A govt letter from the revenue & DM  (LR )RLR.122/2012/134A  was also issued in this regard . However,  I am sorry to state that there has been little /  no progress  after registering my complaints and no resolution has been provided  .
Attached :
1 Death certificate of Sh M.K. Jain depicting my name as wife

Regards ,
Sudha Jain
( wife of Sh M. k . Jain )
929 , Barket Nagar , Kisan Marg ,
Jaipur (Raj ) 302015

remarks_text:
1.       The promotion and development of tourism including eco-tourism is primarily the responsibility of State Government/ UT Administrations.

2.       However, the Ministry of Tourism, under its various scheme guidelines provides financial assistance to State Governments/ Union Territory Administrations for development of tourism related infrastructure in the country.

3.       The projects undertaken for development by the Ministry are identified in consultation with State Governments/ Union Territory Administrations / Central Agencies and are sanctioned subject to submission of project proposals by them, their adherence to relevant scheme guidelines, submission of suitable Detailed Project Reports, availability of funds and utilization of funds released for projects sanctioned earlier.

4.       There is no provision of taking up the infrastructure development projects directly by the Ministry of Tourism under its schemes.
 
5.	With a view to act upon your several representations and meetings with senior officers, and under directions from the Ministry of Tourism, this office had undertaken a site visit to explore the possibilities of developing Beri Panchpota as an Eco-tourism spot. The relevant report dated 24.06.2022 was sent to the Niche Tourism Division of the Ministry of Tourism. The report, inter alia, stated that Beri Panchpota has the potential to become an Eco-tourism spot subject to creation and development of some civic amenities as well as tourism infrastructure and that many interventions in these areas may be required from the Government.

6.	The said report of this office was forwarded by the Ministry of Tourism to the Govt. of West Bengal, with a request to take further necessary action in this regard.
subject_content_text:
NITI Aayog >> Tourism >> Tourism Statistics
-----------------------
Sir,


        After meeting reg development of Beri Panchpota Ecotourism with Honorable Secretary (Central Tourism Ministry) Mr. Arvind Singh, nearly Eight months passed. There was no initiative to build Ecotourism at Beri Panchpota till now. The development of the Beri Panchpota Ecotourism center will benefit millions of people in at least three assembly constituencies in West Bengal. We want, this tourism project should be developed in collaboration with the central and state government both.


         I would request you to look into the matter.

Thanking You,

Jyoti Prokash Ghosh.

remarks_text: The Pr.DIT(Inv.), Hyderabad vide Action Taken Report dated 25.01.2023 has reported that - In the petition, the petitioner mentioned various central government departments and investigation agencies stating that they processed his appeals and grant him reward under Income Tax Reward Scheme and attached all the correspondence made by him with various offices. On examination of the grievance filed and the attachments enclosed, it is submitted that the petitioner is filing vague petitions and is requesting to grant rewards for the petitions filed by him. In this regard, it is submitted that Reward is given based on the detection of undisclosed income on the basis of information provided by the petitioner. However, in the present case, the petitioner filed grievance seeking reward as per Income Tax Reward Scheme to help and support his unemployment and poverty referring to earlier petitions filed by him with various officers and investigation agencies which were already disposed. Since no new information was provided by the petitioner in grievance excepting requesting the interim reward as per Income Tax Reward Scheme, the question of reward does not arise and his grievance petition is disposed accordingly.

-----------------------
जनपद पंचायत विजयपुर मै बिना जीएसटी रजिस्ट्रेशन वाली फर्म के कच्चे बिल पास किए जा रहे जो की शासन के नियम विरुद्ध है। मोहन लाल गुप्ता शासन को धोका देने के उद्देश्य से दो फर्मों के नाम से बिल काट रहे है जिसमे एक फर्म कैलादेवी ट्रेडर्स है जिसका जीएसटी मैं रजिस्ट्रेशन है जबकि एक दूसरी फर्म मोहनलाल s/o शिवजीलाल लाल है जिसका जीएसटी मैं रजिस्ट्रेशन नही है और इसपे टिन नंबर डाल रखा हैं जब जीएसटी एक्ट 2017 मैं लागू हो गया था तो फिर ये फर्म का कोई अस्तित्व नहीं है। जनपद पंचायत विजयपुर के अधिकारियों से मिलकर इस फर्म के संचालक ने शासन को धोका देते हुए कच्चे बिल भी पास करवाए है और शासन को आर्थिक क्षति पहुंचाई है। मेरे पास साक्ष्य हेतु 2017 के बाद के एक ही संचालक के दो फर्मों से भुगतान प्राप्त किए हुए बिल है। जिनक भुगतान जनपद पंचायत विजयपुर से अधिकारियों की मिलीभगत से हुआ है। इतने स्पष्ट तथ्य होने के बाद भी अपनी दो फर्मों के माध्यम से शासकीय धन का गबन कर आर्थिक अपराध करने वाले मोहनलाल गुप्ता के खिलाफ भ्रष्ट्राचार के कारण  आज दिनांक तक कोई कार्यवाही नहीं की जा रही है।

remarks_text: ग्रामीण सड़क राज्य सरकार का विषय है और राज्य में प्रधान मंत्री ग्राम सड़क योजना (पीएमजीएसवाई) को लागू करने के लिए राज्य सरकार नोडल एजेंसी है। आप अपनी GRIEVANCES को सीधा राज्य के साथ साझा कर सकते है । कृपया राज्य द्वारा प्रस्तुत संलग्न क्रत कारवाई रिपोर्ट प्राप्त करें।

        TVM.

Subject: Complaint Letter for withholding my (X-X-X-X-X) EPF amount of Rs. 3218904 and for Cheating by company Infoblox (X-X-X-X-X) for not matching Employee contribution to Employer contribution.

Respected Sir/ Madam,

        I‌ Shankar Ganesh P.J (Employee XDX X0X0X8 and PAN# X-X-X-X-X)., from 24th April 2017 till 15th December 2021 was working as Staff Engineer at Infoblox Technical Support and Software Development Private Limited, Unit No 02 in Office 1 (Level 4), Golden Heights, Dr. Rajkumar Road, 1/2, 59th C Cross, 4th M Block, Rajajinagar Bangalore – 560 010.

Member ID/Name: X-X-X-X-X / SHANKAR GANESH P J
UAN: X0X3X7X6X2X7

To hide their fraud, the company Infoblox has not provided my EPF, Form-16 for the financial year 2021 to 2022 and deliberately withheld my Form-16, all Tax statements, payslips showing break-up, gross & net salary. Infoblox is intentionally doing this to harass me. Even after submitting my grievance XOXEX/X/X0X2X0X9X6 in EPFO, still my EPF money was not transferred by Infoblox. Infoblox deliberately did not mark my Exit and also I got cheated by Infoblox for (X-X-X-X-X) for not matching Employee contribution to Employer contribution ratio. I am bringing this to your kind attention.


 I humbly pray and request you to initiate appropriate action as against Infoblox Technical Support and Software Development Private Limited to match Employee contribution to Employer contribution, mark my Exit and kindly request you to recover my EPF amount from Infoblox and transfer to my current EPF account with interest.

 

Your faithfully,

P. J Shankar Ganesh.

remarks_text: The reply of 6 numbers of PG cases by Shri Rajesh Kumar Bagarti regarding poor network connectivity and installation of  new RJIO tower under USOF scheme at four villages of Deogarh district, one village of Nayagarh and one village of Koraput district is attached as ANNEXURE.
subject_content_text:
Telecommunications >> Suggestions >> Others
-----------------------
Honourable Minister Department of Telecommunications, Government of India.
(Grievance-Dear Sir, I would like to draw your urgent attention that Nepal village which comes under the Banthapur Gramapanchyat of Odagaon Block in Nayagarh District of Odisha State. It is an undeveloped hill cum inter remote area and has been cut out from other part of mainstream area of this country since long time. The network connectivity and internet penetration for Telecommunication is very poor and even not working properly. The residents of this village, students and other business personalities are unable to access the internet for their banking and other online services. The students are also unable to attend any online activities due to above mentioned problems. The people are unable to call the ambulance, fire services due to the lack of network problem during emergency time. The facilities of digital India has not reached to these area till now. They have been underprivileged and digitally not connected with rest of the country. 
Therefore, I kindly request you to please install a new Reliance Jio-4G/5G cum BSNL-3G/4G/5G Mobile Tower under the scheme of Universal Service Obligation Fund (USOF) at the particular place of Nepal village which comes under the Banthapur Gramapanchyat of Odagaon Block in Nayagarh District of Odisha State. So that these underprivileged people will be connected digitally and can take the advantages of digital services.)

subject_content_text:
Financial Services (Banking Division) >> Government sponsored Schemes Related >> Prime Minister Rojgar Yojana

Bank : State Bank of India
Branch / Name of Bank and Branch : Palasaguda
Date of Application : 01-01-2023
-----------------------
ମାନନୀୟ,
             ଶ୍ରୀ ଯୁକ୍ତ ଭାରତ ପ୍ରଧାନ ମନ୍ତ୍ରୀ ମହୋଦୟ ଭାରତ ସରକାର ଦିଲ୍ଲୀ 

ମହୋଦୟ----------- ସମୀପେଶୁ

ଜିଲ୍ଳାର ନାମ-------- ବୌଦ୍ଧ 

( ବୌଦ୍ଧ ଜିଲ୍ଲାରେ PMEGP ଋଣ ସରକାରୀ ଯୋଜନାରେ ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ମାନଙ୍କୁ ନ୍ୟାୟ ମିଲି ପାରୁନାହିଁ palasaguda ଷ୍ଟେଟ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କରେ ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରକାର କାଗଜ ପତ୍ର ଦାଖଲ କରୁଥିଲେ ମଧ୍ୟ ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସର ବିଭିନ୍ନ ପ୍ରକାରର ନାଟ କରି ବାରମ୍ବାର PMEGP ଋଣ ରିଜେଷ୍ଟ୍ କରୁଥିବାରୁ palasaguda ଷ୍ଟେଟ୍ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କଋ ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସର ବଦଳି ଦାବି ପତ୍ର ଦାଖଲ ସମ୍ବନ୍ଧେ କଣ୍ଟାମାଳ ବ୍ଲକର ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ମାନଙ୍କ ଜରିଆରେ ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସର ବଦଳି ଦାବି)

ମହାଶୟ,
           ନିବେଦନର କାରଣ ଏହିକି ଆମ ବୌଦ୍ଧ ଜିଲ୍ଲାର କଣ୍ଟାମାଳ ବ୍ଲକର ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ହୋଇ ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ପ୍ରତିଷ୍ଠାନ କରିବା ସ୍ବାବଲମ୍ବୀ ହେବା ପାଇଁ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କ ଜରିଆରେ କାହିଁକି ସରକାରୀ PMEGP ଋଣ ପ୍ରଦାନ ହୋଇ ପାରିବ ନାହିଁ, ଅନ୍ୟ ଜିଲ୍ଲାରୁ ଆସି ବୌଦ୍ଧ ଜିଲ୍ଲାରେ ସରକାରୀ ଯୋଜନାରେ ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ମାନଙ୍କୁ ବହୁତ୍ ଅନ୍ୟାୟ କରୁଥିବାରୁ ବାରମ୍ବାର ଅଭିଯୋଗ କଲେ ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ମାନଙ୍କୁ ନ୍ୟାୟ ମିଲି ପାରୁନାହିଁ ବର୍ଷ ବର୍ଷ ଧରି ଆଶ୍ବସନା ଦେଇ ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରକାର କାଗଜ ପତ୍ର pending ରଖି ବିଭିନ୍ନ ପ୍ରକାର ନାଟ ଦେଖାଇ ବାରମ୍ବାର ରିଜେଷ୍ଟ କରୁଥିବା ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସର କଣ୍ଟାମାଳ ବ୍ଲକ ଅନ୍ତର୍ଗତ palasaguda ଷ୍ଟେଟ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କରୁ ତୁରନ୍ତ ବଦଳି କରିବା ପାଇଁ କଣ୍ଟାମାଳ ବ୍ଲକ ଅନ୍ତର୍ଗତ ଖଟଖଟିଆ ଗ୍ରାମ ପଞ୍ଚାୟତ ବାସୀ ଅଭିଯୋଗ ଦାଖଲ କରିଥିବାର ତୁରନ୍ତ ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସର ବଦଳି ଦାବୀରେ।

ବୌଦ୍ଧ ଜିଲ୍ଲାର ସ୍ଥାୟୀ ବାସିନ୍ଦା ହୋଇ ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ପ୍ରତିଷ୍ଠାନ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କ ଜରିଆରେ ଋଣ ପ୍ରଦାନ ହୋଇ ପାରୁନାହିଁ। ବାରମ୍ବାର ଅଭିଯୋଗ କରୁଥିଲେ ମଧ୍ୟ ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ମାନଙ୍କୁ ନ୍ୟାୟ ମିଲି ପାରୁନାହିଁ ବର୍ଷ ବର୍ଷ ଧରି ଠକି ଚାଲିଥିବା ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସର palasaguda ଷ୍ଟେଟ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କରୁ ତୁରନ୍ତ ବଦଳି ଦାବିରେ ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ମାନଙ୍କ ଜରିଆରେ ଦାବୀ ପତ୍ର।

ଏଣୁ ଆପଣଙ୍କୁ ବିନୀତ ଅନୁରୋଧ କରୁଛି ଯେ କଣ୍ଟାମାଳ ବ୍ଲକର ସ୍ଥାୟୀ ବାସିନ୍ଦା ହୋଇ ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ପ୍ରତିଷ୍ଠାନ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ସରକାରୀ ଯୋଜନା ଅନୁସାରେ କାହିଁକି ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କ ଜରିଆରେ ଋଣ ପ୍ରଦାନ ହୋଇ ପାରିବନାହିଁ  ଅନ୍ୟ ଜିଲ୍ଲାରୁ ଆସିଥିବା ଅଫିସର ମାନେ ଜବାବ୍ ଦିଅନ୍ତୁ, ଏଣୁ ଉପରୋକ୍ତ ବିଷୟ ପ୍ରତି ଧ୍ୟାନ ଦେଇ palasaguda ଷ୍ଟେଟ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କରେ ଅଟକି ରହିଥିବା ଋଣ ଖୁବ୍ ଶୀଘ୍ର ପ୍ରଦାନ କଲେ କଣ୍ଟାମାଳ ବ୍ଲକର ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ମୁନ୍ନା ଭୋଇ ଆପଣଙ୍କ ନିକଟରେ ଚିର କୃତଜ୍ଞ ରହିବୁ।
          
               
                     ଇତି
              ଆପଣଙ୍କର ବିଶ୍ବସ୍ତ ବୌଦ୍ଧ ଜିଲ୍ଲା ଅନ୍ତର୍ଗତ କଣ୍ଟାମାଳ 
 ବ୍ଲକ ଖଟଖଟିଆ ଗ୍ରାମ୍ୟ ପଞ୍ଚାୟତ ଦମାମୁଣ୍ଡା ଗ୍ରାମର  ସ୍ଥାୟୀ ବାସିନ୍ଦା ମୁନ୍ନା ଭୋଇ।

XAXPX/X/X0X2X4X4X6	REGARDING CBCID INSPECTION,

Financial Services (Banking Division) >> Government sponsored Schemes Related >> Prime Minister Rojgar Yojana

Bank : State Bank of India
Branch / Name of Bank and Branch : Palasaguda
Date of Application : 01-01-2023
-----------------------
To,
      The state bank of india Mumbai 

ଜିଲ୍ଳାର ନାମ-------- ବୌଦ୍ଧ 

( ବୌଦ୍ଧ ଜିଲ୍ଲାରେ PMEGP ଋଣ ସରକାରୀ ଯୋଜନାରେ ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ମାନଙ୍କୁ ନ୍ୟାୟ ମିଲି ପାରୁନାହିଁ palasaguda ଷ୍ଟେଟ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କରେ ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରକାର କାଗଜ ପତ୍ର ଦାଖଲ କରୁଥିଲେ ମଧ୍ୟ ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସର ବିଭିନ୍ନ ପ୍ରକାରର ନାଟ କରି ବାରମ୍ବାର PMEGP ଋଣ ରିଜେଷ୍ଟ୍ କରୁଥିବାରୁ palasaguda ଷ୍ଟେଟ୍ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କଋ ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସର ବଦଳି ଦାବି ପତ୍ର ଦାଖଲ ସମ୍ବନ୍ଧେ କଣ୍ଟାମାଳ ବ୍ଲକର ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ମାନଙ୍କ ଜରିଆରେ ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସର ବଦଳି ଦାବି)

ମହାଶୟ,
           ନିବେଦନର କାରଣ ଏହିକି ଆମ ବୌଦ୍ଧ ଜିଲ୍ଲାର କଣ୍ଟାମାଳ ବ୍ଲକର ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ହୋଇ ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ପ୍ରତିଷ୍ଠାନ କରିବା ସ୍ବାବଲମ୍ବୀ ହେବା ପାଇଁ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କ ଜରିଆରେ କାହିଁକି ସରକାରୀ PMEGP ଋଣ ପ୍ରଦାନ ହୋଇ ପାରିବ ନାହିଁ, ଅନ୍ୟ ଜିଲ୍ଲାରୁ ଆସି ବୌଦ୍ଧ ଜିଲ୍ଲାରେ ସରକାରୀ ଯୋଜନାରେ ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ମାନଙ୍କୁ ବହୁତ୍ ଅନ୍ୟାୟ କରୁଥିବାରୁ ବାରମ୍ବାର ଅଭିଯୋଗ କଲେ ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ମାନଙ୍କୁ ନ୍ୟାୟ ମିଲି ପାରୁନାହିଁ ବର୍ଷ ବର୍ଷ ଧରି ଆଶ୍ବସନା ଦେଇ ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରକାର କାଗଜ ପତ୍ର pending ରଖି ବିଭିନ୍ନ ପ୍ରକାର ନାଟ ଦେଖାଇ ବାରମ୍ବାର ରିଜେଷ୍ଟ କରୁଥିବା ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସର କଣ୍ଟାମାଳ ବ୍ଲକ ଅନ୍ତର୍ଗତ palasaguda ଷ୍ଟେଟ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କରୁ ତୁରନ୍ତ ବଦଳି କରିବା ପାଇଁ କଣ୍ଟାମାଳ ବ୍ଲକ ଅନ୍ତର୍ଗତ ଖଟଖଟିଆ ଗ୍ରାମ ପଞ୍ଚାୟତ ବାସୀ ଅଭିଯୋଗ ଦାଖଲ କରିଥିବାର ତୁରନ୍ତ ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସର ବଦଳି ଦାବୀରେ।

ବୌଦ୍ଧ ଜିଲ୍ଲାର ସ୍ଥାୟୀ ବାସିନ୍ଦା ହୋଇ ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ପ୍ରତିଷ୍ଠାନ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କ ଜରିଆରେ ଋଣ ପ୍ରଦାନ ହୋଇ ପାରୁନାହିଁ। ବାରମ୍ବାର ଅଭିଯୋଗ କରୁଥିଲେ ମଧ୍ୟ ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ମାନଙ୍କୁ ନ୍ୟାୟ ମିଲି ପାରୁନାହିଁ ବର୍ଷ ବର୍ଷ ଧରି ଠକି ଚାଲିଥିବା ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସର palasaguda ଷ୍ଟେଟ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କରୁ ତୁରନ୍ତ ବଦଳି ଦାବିରେ ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ମାନଙ୍କ ଜରିଆରେ ଦାବୀ ପତ୍ର।

ଏଣୁ ଆପଣଙ୍କୁ ବିନୀତ ଅନୁରୋଧ କରୁଛି ଯେ କଣ୍ଟାମାଳ ବ୍ଲକର ସ୍ଥାୟୀ ବାସିନ୍ଦା ହୋଇ ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ପ୍ରତିଷ୍ଠାନ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ସରକାରୀ ଯୋଜନା ଅନୁସାରେ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କ ଜରିଆରେ ଋଣ ପ୍ରଦାନ ହୋଇ ପାରୁନାହିଁ , ଏଣୁ ଉପରୋକ୍ତ ବିଷୟ ପ୍ରତି ଧ୍ୟାନ ଦେଇ palasaguda ଷ୍ଟେଟ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କରେ ଅଟକି ରହିଥିବା ଋଣ ଖୁବ୍ ଶୀଘ୍ର ପ୍ରଦାନ କଲେ କଣ୍ଟାମାଳ ବ୍ଲକର ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ମାନେ ଆପଣଙ୍କ ନିକଟରେ ଚିର କୃତଜ୍ଞ ରହିବୁ ।
          
               
                     ଇତି
              ଆପଣଙ୍କର ବିଶ୍ବସ୍ତ ବୌଦ୍ଧ ଜିଲ୍ଲା ଅନ୍ତର୍ଗତ କଣ୍ଟାମାଳ 
 ବ୍ଲକ ଖଟଖଟିଆ ଗ୍ରାମ୍ୟ ପଞ୍ଚାୟତ ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ବୃନ୍ଦ
ସ୍ବାକ୍ଷର 1......... ବିରେନ୍ଦ୍ର ମେହେର
          2......... ନେତ୍ରା ନନ୍ଦ ମେହେର
          3.......... ଚକାବନ୍ ବିଶି
          4.......... ମୁନ୍ନା ଭୋଇ

सेवा में
माननीय प्रधान मंत्री जी
साउथ ब्लॉक, रायसिना हिल
न्यू दिल्ली- 110011

विषय :- पढ़ाई में आर्थिक मदद हेतु प्रार्थना पत्र ।

श्रीमान जी,

निवेदन यह है कि मैं दिलीप S/o मुन्नीलाल गाँव-भोड़वाल माजरी, तहसील-समालखा, ज़िला-पानीपत, राज़्य-हरियाणा का रहने वाला हूँ। मैंने स्नातक(बी.ए.) तक पढ़ाई की है। मैं अपनी पढ़ाई आगे भी जारी रखना चाहता था लेकिन परिवार की आर्थिक परिस्थितियों कि वजह से मैं अपनी पढ़ाई आगे नहीं कर पाया। मेरे पिता जी एक प्राइवेट कंपनी में जॉब करते है । उनकी सैलरी इतनी नहीं है की वह मुझे यहाँ तक ले जाए। उनकी सैलरी से घर का खर्चा और मकान का हर महीने का किराया ही निकल पता है। उन्होंने मेरे लिये पहले ही बहुत कुछ किया है और मुझे इस लायक़ बना दिया है की मैं आज किसी पर भी निर्भर नहीं हूँ ।
मैं छोटा मोटा ऑनलाइन वर्क कर के अपने पढ़ाई का थोड़ा बहुत खर्चा निकाल लेता हूँ लेकिन इससे मैं अपने सपने को पूरा नहीं कर सकता।                                                                                                                                                                        मैं शारीरिक रूप से दोनों पैर से विकलांग हूँ। मुझे इस बात का भी कोई अफ़सॉस नहीं हैं। मैं अपनी ज़िंदगी में बहुत आगे जानना चाहता हूँ और समाज और दुनिया के लिये मुझे एक मिसाल बनना हैं और मुझे जैसे जितने भी व्यक्ति है मैं उन सब की हर प्रकार से मदद करना चाहता हूँ लेकिन इसके लिए मुझे अपना सपना UPSC( IAS) को पूरा करना है। मैं अपने दम पर जहाँ तक कर पाया हूँ किया है मैंने लेकिन अब बिना कोचिंग और आपके सपोर्ट के बिना मैं अपने इस मुक़ाम को हासिल नहीं कर सकता। मुझे ख़ुद पर और ख़ुद के मेहनत पर पूरा विश्वास है कि मैं इस मुक़ाम को हासिल कर सकता हूँ बस आपका मुझे एक छोटा सा सपोर्ट चाहिए ।
मैं आपसे बस इतना कहना चाहता हूँ की आप मुझे किसी भी संस्थान में UPSC की तैयारी के लिए स्पान्सर कर दीजिए ताकि मैं अपने पैरो पर खड़ा हो सकूँ। मैंने अपने दम पर बहुत कोशिश की है करने की लेकिन अब मेरे लिए बहुत मुश्किल होता जा रहा है इसलिए अंत में आपके अलावा मैं किसी और पर विश्वास नहीं कर सकता हूँ।
मैं अपने पढ़ाई की कॉपी और Handicap Certificate भी आपको भेज रहा हूँ। क्योंकि मैं बहुत ही उम्मीद के साथ आपके पास हूँ आया हूँ और मुझे आशा है कि आप इस विषय में मेरी मदद जरूर करेंगे । आपकी मुझ पर अति कृपा होगी।

आप को ऐसे पत्र लिखने के लिए भी क्षमा का पात्र हूँ । क्योंकि मैं जानता हूँ की आपके लिये समय का कितना महत्व है और यह जानते हुए भी मैंने यह विनती पत्र लिख कर गलती की है ।लेकिन मेरे पास और कोई रास्ता नहीं  बचा है इसलिए मैंने अंत में आपके पास आने का यह कदम उठाया है । आप दो मिनट का समय निकाल कर मेरी विनती को स्वीकार कर मुझे पर यह उपकार करने की कृपा करें।

Information and Broadcasting >> DTH Matters >> Any Other

Name of DTH operators : Sun direct
Any Other : First page related
-----------------------
It is brought to the notice of SUN DIRECT that the first channel after the setup is turned on,turns out to be a Tamil Channel.  Its a great matter of shame that this dth operator doesnt display channels accordance to the state or region. What do people of Telangana understand Tamil as startup channel and what do people of Karnataka understand channel of Tamil i.e Sun Tv . How do illerate people understand how to operate channels if they are not properly arranged in order of their dwelling states. Management should have minimum knowledge to correct and address these changes. Pathetic and poor customer care officers, even the appellate authority seems to be weird in addressing reagional channels on startup. Local cable operators and MSO are far better than a South operated dth operator like yours,who doesnt even understand customer needs. Secondly, issue of very less news channels in telugu whereas there are so many channels in tamil language. Its a language discrimination and barrier setup by your firm. You being operator from from Tamil Nadu doesnt mean that you favour only customers of Tamil Nadu and leave other people interest. Im gonna seriously write to TRAI and MSO forum on the same on the discrimination of channel preference as per states.

remarks_text: With reference to the grievance, it is informed that the complainant cum member has applied for transfer from X-X-X-X-X to X-X-X-X-X. Although Regional office Noida settled the transfer claim form 13 but the transferred amount could not be credited to the member id X-X-X-X-X, as investigation is going on against the establishment M/s D K Construction bearing code Number X-X-X-X-X for doing some suspicious activities. It observed that recently many member of the establishment have taken transfer from other region and after working less than a month, they have approved for final settlement from member id of this establishment. This case is one of the many cases which comes under fraud committed by certain bogus/fraudulent employer who has shown employees working in some other establishment as his own employee by linking their existing UAN and thereby attaining the right to modify the KYC of such employees. This type of fraud has been clarified as “Chandigarh” type of fraud by the Head Office of EPFO. As the activity of the establishment is found to be suspicious at this stage, final decision in the matter will be taken after receipt of the investigation report from the Enforcement officer. Hence, the complainant may be advised to wait for some time till the final outcome of the investigation	SHASHI BHUSHAN KUMAR (RPFC I)

Thanks,
Simant D.

remarks_text: The Pr.DIT(Inv.), Hyderabad vide Action Taken Report dated 25.01.2023 has reported that - In the instant grievance, the complainant is requesting for employment as reward and has attached a document containing previously filed grievances and complaints. However, it is noticed upon perusal of the grievances/complaints filed by the complainant Sri D.S.Kishore, none of the said grievances/ complaints contains any tangible information with respect to evasion of taxes by any of the persons and possess only vague allegations and hence no further action in the petitions is possible. Further, in all the grievances/ complaints filed the above complainant, he has unfailingly requested for reward and employment in lieu of the information provided to the Department. Since, none of the grievances/complaints contain any tangible and actionable information against any person and does not contribute in detection of undisclosed income or black money, the complainant Sri D.S.Kishore is not eligible for any reward. In this regard, it is submitted that the grievance petition may be treated as closed.

ସମ୍ମାନୀୟ ସାର୍ ମୁଁ ଜାନୁୟାରୀ 27/01/2022 ରେ ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରକାର କାଗଜ ପତ୍ର Palasaguda ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କ ରେ ଜମା କରି ଅଛି ହେଲେ  ବର୍ଷେ ହେବ ବିତି ଯାଇଥିଲେ ସୁଦ୍ଧା କୌଣସି ଉତ୍ତର ମିଲି ନାହିଁ, ଆଉ କେତେ ବର୍ଷ ଅଭିଯୋଗ କଲେ ମୋର୍ ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର ହୋଇ ପାରିବ ସାର୍, ମୁଁ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କ କୁ ଯାଇ ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସରଙ୍କୁ ପଚାରିବାରୁ ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସର କହିଲେ ମୁଁ ବୌଦ୍ଧ ଷ୍ଟେଟ୍ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କ୍ Racc କୁ ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରକାର କାଗଜ ପତ୍ର ଏବଂ ଋଣ ପ୍ରୋପଚାଲ୍ ପଠାଇ ଦେଇଛି ବୋଲି  ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସର ବର୍ଷେ ହେବ ଠକୁ ଥିବାରୁ  କୌଣସି ଉତ୍ତର ଆସି ନାହିଁ ମୋ ପାଖକୁ, ମୁଁ ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ପ୍ରତିଷ୍ଠାନ ପାଇଁ ବାରମ୍ବାର ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରକାର କାଗଜ ପତ୍ର ଦାଖଲ କଲା ପରେ ବି ସୁଦ୍ଧା କୌଣସି ସୁଫଳ ମିଳି ନଥିବାରୁ ମୁଁ କାଗଜ ପତ୍ର ରେ ପଚାଶ ହାଜର ଟଙ୍କା ଖର୍ଚ୍ଚ କରି ଅଛି ସେ ଟଙ୍କା ଦେବ କିଏ, ମୋର ବହୁତ କ୍ଷତି କରିଥିବା ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସର ମୋର୍ କ୍ଷତି ପୂରଣ ଦିୟା ଗଲେ ଅଭିଯୋଗ ସବୁ ଦିନ ପାଇଁ ବନ୍ଧ ରହିବ ନୋ ହେଲେ ଅଭିଯୋଗ ସବୁଦିନ ପାଇଁ ଜାରି ରହିବାର ମୁନ୍ନା ଭୋଇ ଚେତା ବନି ଦେଉଛି । 

ଗୋଟିଏ ଛଟ ସାହାଯ୍ୟ ପାଇଁ ବର୍ଷ ବର୍ଷ ଲାଗୁଛି ହେଲେ ଆଉ କେତେ ବର୍ଷ ପରେ ମୋର୍ ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର ହୋଇ ପାରିବ ଉତ୍ତର ଦେଇ ପାରିବେ କି ସାର୍। ବାରମ୍ଵାର ଅଭିଯୋଗ କଲା ପରେ ବୁଝି ପାରୁନାହିଁ , ଆଉ କେତେ ବର୍ଷ ଅଭିଯୋଗ କଲେ ବୁଝି ପାରିବେ ସାର୍ ଏ ବିଷୟରେ ଉତ୍ତର ଦେଇ ପାରିବେ କି।

ମୁଁ ଜଣେ ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ମୁଁ ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ପ୍ରତିଷ୍ଠାନ ପାଇଁ ସରକାରଙ୍କ ତରଫରୁ ଯୋଜନା ଆରମ୍ଭ ହୋଇ ଥିବା ଆବେଦନ କଲି ହେଲେ ବର୍ଷ ବର୍ଷ ଧରି ହଇରାଣ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ସରକାରୀ ଯୋଜନା ଆରମ୍ଭ ହୋଇ ଅଛି କି ସାର୍ ଏ ବିଷୟରେ ଉତ୍ତର ଦେଇ ପାରିବେ କି ସାର୍।

ଯଦି ମୋର୍ ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର ନୋ ହୁଏ ତାହେଲେ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କ ଶାଖା ସାମ୍ନା ରେ ଅନସନରେ ବସିବାକୁ ବାଧ୍ୟ ହେବି।

ମୋର୍ ହୋଇ ଥିବା କ୍ଷତି ପୂରଣ କିଏ ଭରଣ ପୋଷଣ କରିବ ମୁଁ ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ଆରମ୍ଭ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ସରକାରୀ ଯୋଜନା ଆବେଦନ କଲି ହେଲେ ହୋଇରାଣ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ସରକାରୀ ଯୋଜନା ଆରମ୍ଭ ହୋଇ ଅଛି କି ସାର୍।

ସରକାର ଶିକ୍ଷିତ ଯୁବକ ଓ ଯୁବତୀ ମାନଙ୍କୁ ଥଇଥାନ ତଥା ରୋଜଗାର କ୍ଷମ କରିବା ପାଇଁ PMEGP ଯୋଜନା ଆରମ୍ଭ ହୋଇ ଥିଲେ ସୁଦ୍ଧା କାଗଜ କଲମରେ ଅଟକି ଯାଉଅଛି।

ମୁଁ ଦୁଇ ମାସ ହେବ ସମସ୍ତ୍ ପ୍ରକାର କାଗଜ ପତ୍ର ଦାଖଲ କଲା ପରେ ବି ସୁଦ୍ଧା ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର ହୋଇ ପାରୁନାହିଁ କୀ ଦୁଃଖର ବିଷୟ ମୁଁ ଜଣେ ଗରୀବ ଯୁବକ ବୋଲି ମୋର୍ ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର କରିବା ପାଇଁ ବର୍ଷ ବର୍ଷ ଲାଗୁଛି ହେଲେ କୋଟି ପୋତି ଲୋକଙ୍କୁ ଖୁବ୍ ଶୀଘ୍ର ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର କରାଯାଉଛି।

ଏଣୁ ଆପଣଙ୍କୁ ବିନୀତ ଅନୁରୋଧ କରେ କି କାଗଜ କଲମରେ ଅଟକି ରହିଥିବା ଋଣ କୁ ଯଥା ଶିଘ୍ର ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କ କୁ ନିର୍ଦ୍ଦେଶ ଦେଇ ଖୁବ୍ ଶୀଘ୍ର ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର କରା ଗଲେ ମୁଁ ଆପଣଙ୍କ ନିକଟରେ ଚିର ଉପକୃତ ହେବି।

Respected Sir
         One of your Commercial-Cum-Reservation Clerk (CC GR) Md. Salim, Employment Id. X0X1X4X0X2X, Date of Appointment 09/12/2013 under South Eastern Railway Zone, “ADRA Division” posted on Bokaro Steel City Railway Station.
        He got a job on a compassionate basis. But he produces false/fake documents at the time of appointment on compassionate grounds. It's a subject of investigation. 
       Kindly verify his documents and their both sisters documents so that you come to a conclusion.
       At the time of birth of Md. Salim on 01/04/1985 his Father Name was Md. Husain after his Younger Sister’s birth on 15/09/1990 her Father Name was Md. Ainul Haque and her Mother’s name is same  Halima Khatun.
     Where is his other father? Which he has not mentioned anywhere. It could also mean that he had killed her and thrown her away. It comes under suspicion. It is also under doubt that which of his father was work in the Railway.
    If he got a job in the name of the first father then what did he do with the second father and if he got a job in the name of the second father then what did he do with the first father. It is often doubted.
    How did he get a compassionate job? 
    In whose name is he doing the job?
    It means he faked something.
    Kindly take this matter serious, investigate this and take appropriate action against him.

Dear sir/Madam request for your list information details required 1. 2016 ମସିହା ଠାରୁ 2022 ମସିହା ପଯ୍ୟନ୍ତ କେତେ ଜଣଙ୍କୁ PMEGP ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର ହୋଇ ଅଛି, ଏବଂ beneficiary ନାମ ଆଉ beneficiary ମଞ୍ଜୁର ହୋଇ ଥିବା ଟଙ୍କା, adress ବିଷୟ ରେ ତଥ୍ୟ ଦିଆ ଯାଉ।

2. 2016 ମସିହା ଠାରୁ 2022 ମସିହା ପଯ୍ୟନ୍ତ କେତେ ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର ହୋଇଅଛି ଏବଂ କେତେ ଋଣ closed ହୋଇ ଅଛି ତା ବିଷୟ ରେ ପରାମର୍ଶ ଦିଆ ଯାଉ।

3. ସରକାରୀ PMEGP ଯୋଜନା ବିଷୟରେ ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରକାର କାଗଜ ପତ୍ର ଦେଇ ଥିବା beneficiary ର ତଥ୍ଯ ବିଷୟରେ ଉତ୍ତର ଦିଆ ଯାଉ, କୋଉ beneficiary କେତେ କାଗଜ ପତ୍ର ଦାଖଲ କରି ଅଛି ତା ବିଷୟ ରେ ପରାମର୍ଶ ଦିଆ ଯାଉ, 2016 ମସିହା ଠାରୁ 2022 ମସିହା ପଯ୍ୟନ୍ତ ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର ହୋଇ ଥିବା ବିଷୟରେ ନିର୍ଦ୍ଦେଶ ଦିଆ ଯାଉ।

4. 2016 ମସିହା ଠାରୁ 2022 ମସିହା ପଯ୍ୟନ୍ତ ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର ହୋଇ ଥିବା ଟଙ୍କା ଏବଂ ସରକାରୀ ସବ୍ସିଡି କେତେ ଜଣ beneficiary ଙ୍କୁ ଦିଆ ଯାଇଛି ତା ବିଷୟ ରେ ପରାମର୍ଶ ଦିଆ ଯାଉ।

5. ସରକାର PMEGP ଋଣ ଯୋଜନା କାହିଁକି ଆରମ୍ଭ କରିଛନ୍ତି କେବଳ କୋଟି ପୋତି ଲୋକଙ୍କୁ ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର କରିବା ପାଇଁ ନା ଶିକ୍ଷିତ ଯୁବକ ଓ ଯୁବତୀ ଙ୍କୁ ଥଇଥାନ୍ କରି ରୋଜଗାର କ୍ଷମ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ତା ବିଷୟ ରେ ନିର୍ଦ୍ଦେଶ ଦିଆ ଯାଉ।

6, ସରକାର PMEGP ଋଣ ଯୋଜନା ଆରମ୍ଭ କରିଛନ୍ତି କେବଳ ଯେଉଁ ମାନଙ୍କର ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ନାହିଁ ତାଙ୍କୁ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କ ଜରିଆରେ ଋଣ ଦେଇ ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ପ୍ରତିଷ୍ଠାନ କରିବା ପାଇଁ କିନ୍ତୁ ଯାହାର ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ଆରମ୍ଭ ହୋଇ ଅଛି ତାଙ୍କୁ କେବଳ ସରକାରୀ ଯୋଜନା ଆରମ୍ଭ ହୋଇ ଅଛି କି ତା ବିଷୟ ରେ ପରାମର୍ଶ ଦିଆ ଯାଉ।

7. ଶିକ୍ଷିତ ଯୁବକ ଯୁବତୀଙ୍କୁ ସ୍ବାବଲମ୍ବୀ କରିବାକୁ ଜିଲ୍ଲା ଶିଳ୍ପ କେନ୍ଦ୍ର ଜରିଆରେ ତାଲିମ ଦେଇ ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ପ୍ରତିଷ୍ଠାନ ପାଇଁ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କ ଜରିଆରେ ଋଣ ପ୍ରଦାନ କରିବାକୁ ସରକାରୀ ନିର୍ଦ୍ଦେଶ ରହିଛି। ଏ ସମ୍ପର୍କ ରେ ବ୍ୟାପକ ପ୍ରଚାର ଓ ପ୍ରସାର ତଥା ସଚେତନତା ସୃଷ୍ଟି କରାଯାଇଛି। ହେଲେ ତାଲିମ ପରେ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କ କୁ ଗଲେ ଋଣ ପ୍ରଦାନ ପାଇଁ ବର୍ଷ ବର୍ଷ ଲାଗୁଛି, ଏ ବିଷୟରେ ବାରମ୍ବାର ଅଭିଯୋଗ କଲେ ମଧ୍ୟ କୌଣସି ସୁଫଳ ମିଳି ପାରୁ ନାହିଁ।
8. 2016 ମସିହା ଠାରୁ 2022 ପର୍ଯ୍ୟନ୍ତ ବୌଦ୍ଧ ଜିଲ୍ଲାରେ କେତେ ଜଣ ଶିକ୍ଷିତ ଯୁବକ ଓ ଯୁବତୀ ମାନଙ୍କୁ ଟ୍ରେନିଙ୍ଗ ଦେଇ ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ପ୍ରତିଷ୍ଠାନ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କ ଜରିଆରେ କେତେ ଜଣ ଶିକ୍ଷିତ ଯୁବକ ଓ ଯୁବତୀ ମାନଙ୍କୁ PMEGP ଋଣ ପ୍ରଦାନ କରାଯାଇଛି, ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରକାର ଲିଷ୍ଟ ପ୍ରଦାନ କରନ୍ତୁ , ମୁଁ ବୌଦ୍ଧ ଜିଲ୍ଲାପାଳଙ୍କ ପାଖରେ ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରକାର ଲିଷ୍ଟ ପ୍ରଦାନ କରିବି ତୁରନ୍ତ ନିର୍ଦ୍ଦେଶ ଦିଆ ଯାଉ।

remarks_text:
Sir/Madam

Staff Selection Commission is a recruiting agency which recruits personnel as per the vacancies reported by the User Departments/Organizations. 
                       
2. 	With regard to criteria of relaxation in upper age limit for the particular examination conducted by the SSC, it is informed that SSC is a recruiting agency which follows the guidelines laid down by the DoP&T vide OM No.X5X1X/X/X0X0-Estt.(D) dated 27.03.2012 which is available on the website of the DoP&T.  with regard to examinations to be conducted by SSC it was decided to fix the  crucial date for determining age as on 01.01.2022 for the examination being notified Calendar Year 2022. In the normal course, the crucial date for determining age for these examinations would have been 01.08.2022 or 01.01.2023, depending on the schedule of conduct of Tier-II Examination. The notice of MTS 2022 Examination was notified in calendar year 2023.  Therefore, crucial date for determining the age limit has been kept as per DOP&T OM dated 14.07.1988.   Further, staff selection Commission is not mandated to provide any relaxation in upper age limit.

ନିବେଦ୍ୟ,
ଏହିକି ମୁଁ ମୁନ୍ନା ଭୋଇ ପି: ଲାଲଚି ଭୋଇ ସ୍ଥା/ପୋ- ଦମାମୁଣ୍ଡା ଥା-ମନମୁଣ୍ଡା ଜି: ବୌଦ୍ଧ ନିମ୍ନମତେ ଜଣାଅଉଛି।

ଗତ 2016- ମସିହା ଠାରୁ 2022 ରେ ମୋତେ ଉପରୋକ୍ତ ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର ହୋଇ ( SBI Palasaguda) ଶାଖାକୁ ବାରମ୍ବାର ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରକାର କାଗଜ ପତ୍ର ଦାଖଲ କଲା ପରେ ସୁଦ୍ଧା ସରକାରୀ PMEGP ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର ହେବା ପାଇଁ ବର୍ଷ ବର୍ଷ ଧରି ଅପେକ୍ଷା କରିବାକୁ ପଡୁଥିବାରୁ ହୋଇ ଥିବା କ୍ଷତି ପୂରଣ କିଏ ଭରଣ ପୋଷଣ କରିବ, ମୁଁ ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ପ୍ରତିଷ୍ଠାନ ପାଇଁ ସରକାରଙ୍କ ତରଫରୁ ଯୋଜନା ଆରମ୍ଭ ହୋଇ ଥିବା PMEGP ଋଣ ଆବେଦନ କଲେ ହିଁ ବର୍ଷ ବର୍ଷ ଧରି ଆଶ୍ବସନା ଦେଇ ଚାଲିଛନ୍ତି, ହେଲେ 2016 ମସିହା ଠାରୁ 2022 ମସିହା ପଯ୍ୟନ୍ତ ଅନ୍ୟ ଲୋକଙ୍କ ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର କରିଥିବାରୁ ମୋର୍ ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର କରିବା ପାଇଁ ଭିଡ଼ ଲାଗୁଛି, ସତେ ଯେମିତି ଧାନ ବିକ୍ରି କରି ସରକାରୀ ଋଣ ପ୍ରଦାନ କରୁଛନ୍ତି। ମୁଁ ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ପ୍ରତିଷ୍ଠାନ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ବାରମ୍ବାର ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରକାର କାଗଜ ପତ୍ର ରେ ଟଙ୍କା ଖର୍ଚ୍ଚ ହୋଇଅଛି ଶେ ଟଙ୍କା ଦେବ କିଏ।


ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରକାର କାଗଜ ପତ୍ର ରେ ଖର୍ଚ୍ଚ ହୋଇ ଥିବା କ୍ଷତି ଟଙ୍କା କିଏ ଭରଣ ପୋଷଣ କରିବ , ସରକାର ଫେରସ୍ତ କରିବେ ନା ସରକାରୀ ଅଫିସର ମାନେ ଫେରସ୍ତ କରିବେ ଏ ବିଷୟରେ ନିର୍ଦ୍ଦେଶ ଦିଆ ଯାଉ। ମୁଁ 27/01/2022 ରେ ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରକାର କାଗଜ ପତ୍ର ଦାଖଲ କରିଥିଲେ ସୁଦ୍ଧା ଚାରି ମାସ ବିତିଯାଇଥିଲେ ସୁଦ୍ଧା କୌଣସି କାର୍ଯ୍ୟାନୁଷ୍ଠାନ ଗ୍ରହଣ କରାଯାଉନାହିଁ। ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର ହେବା ପାଇଁ ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସରଙ୍କୁ ପଚାରିବାରୁ ଫିଲ୍ଡ ଅଫିସର କହିଲେ ମୁଁ ସମସ୍ତ ପ୍ରକାର କାଗଜ ପତ୍ର ବୌଦ୍ଧ ଜିଲ୍ଲାର ଷ୍ଟେଟ ବ୍ୟାଙ୍କର Racc କୁ ପଠେଇଛି ବୋଲି କହୁଛନ୍ତି ହେଲେ ଚାରି ମାସ ବିତିଯାଇଥିଲେ ସୁଦ୍ଧା କୌଣସି ଉତ୍ତର ଆସି ନାହିଁ। ଆଉ କେତେ ବର୍ଷ ଗଲେ ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର ହୋଇ ପାରିବ ସାର୍। ଅନ୍ୟ ଲୋକଙ୍କୁ ଖୁବ୍ ଶୀଘ୍ର ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର କରୁଛନ୍ତି ହେଲେ ମୋର୍ ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର ହେବା ପାଇଁ ବର୍ଷ ବର୍ଷ ଲାଗୁଛି। ସରକାର ବର୍ଷ ବର୍ଷ ଧରି ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର କରିବା ପାଇଁ PMEGP ଋଣ ଯୋଜନା ଆରମ୍ଭ କରିଛନ୍ତି କି ସାର୍।

ମୁଁ ବ୍ୟବସାୟ ପ୍ରତିଷ୍ଠାନ କରିବା ପାଇଁ ବାରମ୍ବାର ଅନୁରୋଧ କରୁଅଛି, ହେଲେ ମୋର୍ କଥାକୁ କର୍ଣ୍ଣପାତ କରୁନାହିଁ, ଅନ୍ୟ ଲୋକଙ୍କ ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର ହେବା ପାଇଁ ଖୁବ୍ ଶୀଘ୍ର କାମ ଆରମ୍ଭ କରି 2016 ମସିହା ଠାରୁ 2022 ମସିହା ପଯ୍ୟନ୍ତ ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର ହୋଇ ଅଛି , ହେଲେ ମୋର ଋଣ ମଞ୍ଜୁର କରିବା ପାଇଁ କାହିଁକି ଭିଡ଼ ହେଉଛି ସାର୍।
